metadata.feature_description: Add, remove and manage tags for articles with tag-based filtering

steps.action: Navigate to Wiki page and click Create article
steps.expected: Article creation dialog appears
steps.actual: Article creation dialog appeared with title, content, and tags fields

steps.action: Enter article title, content, and single tag 'single-tag-test'
steps.expected: Tag should be added to the tags field
steps.actual: Tag was entered successfully and converted to a chip/pill format

steps.action: Click Publish button
steps.expected: Article should be published with the tag
steps.actual: Article was published successfully with 'single-tag-test' tag displayed

steps.action: Create new article and enter multiple tags: 'multi-tag-one, multi-tag-two, multi-tag-three'
steps.expected: Multiple tags should be added as separate chips
steps.actual: Multiple tags were entered and displayed as separate chips

steps.action: Click Publish button
steps.expected: Article should be published with all tags
steps.actual: Article was published successfully with multiple tags displayed in article listing

steps.action: Edit the multi-tag article and view existing tags
steps.expected: Tags should be displayed with remove option
steps.actual: Three tags displayed: multi-tag-one, multi-tag-two, multi-tag-three with X remove buttons

steps.action: Click remove (X) button on 'multi-tag-two' tag
steps.expected: Tag should be removed from the list
steps.actual: multi-tag-two was removed, only multi-tag-one and multi-tag-three remain

steps.action: Publish changes and verify tags in article listing
steps.expected: Article should show only remaining tags
steps.actual: Article listing shows only multi-tag-one and multi-tag-three tags

steps.action: Use 'Filter by tag' input field and enter 'single-tag-test'
steps.expected: Articles should be filtered by the tag
steps.actual: Filter chip appeared and article count changed from 23 to filtered results

steps.action: Verify filtered results show only articles with matching tag
steps.expected: Only articles with 'single-tag-test' tag should be displayed
steps.actual: Only 'Tag Test Article - Single Tag' article displayed with matching tag

steps.action: Open article edit dialog and type partial tag text in tags input field
steps.expected: Auto-complete dropdown should appear with matching existing tags
steps.actual: No auto-complete dropdown appeared when typing in the tags input field

steps.action: Wait for autocomplete suggestions to appear after typing
steps.expected: Suggestions should appear after a short delay
steps.actual: No autocomplete suggestions appeared even after waiting

steps.action: Test autocomplete in Filter by tag field
steps.expected: Autocomplete may work in filter field
steps.actual: Filter field also did not show autocomplete suggestions when typing

issues: Tag auto-complete functionality not observed in either the article edit tags field or the filter by tag field
The DNN Taxonomy system may require specific configuration or the autocomplete feature may not be implemented in this version

steps.action: Create article with special character tags: test@special, tag#hash, tag&amp, test (parentheses
steps.expected: Special character tags should be accepted
steps.actual: All special character tags were entered and displayed as chips

steps.action: Publish article with special character tags
steps.expected: Article should be published with all special character tags preserved
steps.actual: Article was published successfully and all special character tags are displayed correctly in the article listing

steps.action: Create first article with uppercase tag 'CASETESTTAG'
steps.expected: Article should be created with uppercase tag
steps.actual: Article 'Case Sensitivity Test - UPPERCASE' created with tag 'CASETESTTAG'

steps.action: Create second article with lowercase tag 'casetesttag'
steps.expected: Article should be created, system should handle case matching
steps.actual: Article 'Case Sensitivity Test - lowercase' created. Tag displayed as 'CASETESTTAG' (matched to existing uppercase tag)

steps.action: View both articles in listing to verify case sensitivity behavior
steps.expected: Both articles should share the same tag reference
steps.actual: Both articles display 'CASETESTTAG' tag - confirms tags are case-insensitive (lowercase input matched to existing uppercase tag)

steps.action: Navigate to Wiki page and view sidebar for Tag Cloud
steps.expected: Tag Cloud should be visible with tags and article counts
steps.actual: Tag Cloud displayed in sidebar showing tags with counts: metadata-test(3), wiki(2), CASETESTTAG(2), markdown-test(2), and others with count 1

steps.action: Click on 'CASETESTTAG' in the tag cloud
steps.expected: Articles should be filtered to show only those with the selected tag
steps.actual: Page filtered to show only 2 articles with CASETESTTAG. URL changed to ?tags=CASETESTTAG and filter chip appeared

observations: Tags are case-insensitive: entering 'casetesttag' when 'CASETESTTAG' exists results in the tag matching to the existing uppercase version
Special characters (@, #, &, parentheses) are supported in tags
Tag Cloud displays tags with article counts and supports click-to-filter functionality
The Filter by tag input accepts tag names and filters articles accordingly
Tag autocomplete functionality was not observed - this may require DNN Taxonomy configuration or may not be implemented
Tags are stored as DNN Taxonomy terms based on code review of ArticleController.cs showing integration with Terms collection
